alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 9:31PM MST until December 28 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Black Mesa area, the Chuska Mountains, White Mountains, and locations along and downwind of the Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...From 10 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Power outages are also possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains
